name: lorelai
notes:
**lorelai knit vest – a timeless and versatile layering piece!  by marly bird**

looking for a chic and cozy addition to your handmade wardrobe? the lorelai knit vest is the perfect project for knitters who love creating stylish, functional garments. featuring the elegant stockinette windows stitch pattern, this vest offers a modern texture that’s both eye-catching and versatile.

✨ pattern features

✔️ skill level: adventurous beginner to intermediate
✔️ sizes included: xs (s, m, l–xl, 2x, 3x, 4x–5x)
✔️ yarn: roll with it melange (worsted weight #4)
✔️ gauge: 17 sts & 28 rows = 4" in stockinette windows pattern
✔️ needles: us 8 [5 mm] circular or size to obtain gauge
✔️ language: english, written in standard american knitting terms
✔️ format: instant pdf digital download

 what’s inside

 written instructions for all 7 sizes
 schematic + size chart
 full instructions for the stockinette windows stitch pattern
 **row-by-row checklist for each step of the pattern**
 optional pocket instructions for added flair
 companion video tutorials from marly bird

measurements
to fit size
xs (s, m, l-xl, 2x, 3x, 4x-5x) 

finished measurements
(also see schematic)
bust 28 (34, 39½, 45, 51, 56.5, 62)” [71 (86.5, 100.5, 114.5, 129.5, 143.5, 157.5) cm]
length 20½ (21, 23¾, 24½, 25¼, 28, 30½)” [52 (53.5, 60.5, 62, 64, 71, 77.5) cm]
designed to have 2-4” of positive ease

gauge 
17 sts in and 28 rows in stockinette windows pattern = 4 x 4” [10 x 10 cm]
note: work a gauge swatch in the stockinette windows pattern stitch over 36 stitches and at least 3 full repeats, then rows 1-4 once more. bind off and measure.

yarn

3 (3, 3, 4, 4, 4, 5) skeins: 	#autograph
